topic.title: Family Medical History Section - conformance rules

section.p: The family history section shall contain a narrative description of the genetic family members, to the extent that they are known, the diseases they suffered from, their ages at death, and other relevant genetic information.

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Family History Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.4)
SHALL conform to CCD Family History Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.4)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10157-6" History of family member diseases (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
